summary: you guys that are hoping kira gets a redemption, stop. not all bad people can be turned good with some tlc. sometimes you need...
body: you guys that are hoping kira gets a redemption, stop. not all bad people can be turned good with some tlc. sometimes you need to let bad people be bad. not everyone can be fixed, and we’ve already had two redemption arcs for characters that are genuinely misunderstood. however kira is unfortunately just very manipulative and overall pretty horrible, so, yeah, stop hoping for redemption for a character that doesn’t deserve it.

summary: I really hope that Kira ends up feeling bad for her actions, but I don't think she'll get a full redemption arc. I think her...
question: I really hope that Kira ends up feeling bad for her actions, but I don't think she'll get a full redemption arc. I think her characters story will probably end with her starting to change. I think that's important to see, but I really hope she AT LEAST apologizes fully to tj, and maybe buffy but who knows if that'll happen
answer:
Yeah if they made it clear that Kira felt bad and she wasn’t just apologizing to get out of trouble, that’d be a little better.

Thinking about all this is hurting my head though. It’s kinda a lot and I think I just need to sit back and watch it, rather than try to figure it out ahead of time lol

Thinking about all this is hurting my head though. It’s kinda a lot and I think I just need to sit back and watch it, rather than try to figure it out ahead of time lol

Yeah if they made it clear that Kira felt bad and she wasn’t just apologizing to get out of trouble, that’d be a little better.

Thinking about all this is hurting my head though. It’s kinda a lot and I think I just need to sit back and watch it, rather than try to figure it out ahead of time lol

blog.name: djheckingfruity
blog.title: Tyrus: Make That Ish Official
blog.description: Jay | She/her | 16 | Andi Mack said be gay do crime | Icon credit @tyrus-chips

tags: your competely valid if it makes you uncomfortable
summary: The Tyrus angst just feels mean, like really mean compared to the other ships. Probably reading too much into it but it does...
question: The Tyrus angst just feels mean, like really mean compared to the other ships. Probably reading too much into it but it does make me uncomfortable
answer:
Well you’re entitled to feel that way. if you’re uncomfortable, I’m not gonna try to change that.

Although for me, I don’t really consider the angst to be “mean” because 1) they’re fictional characters so they’ll be okay, 2) the angst is for storytelling purposes, not to torture us or make us feel bad, and 3) we know they get a happy ending

We’re going through the hard part right now, but once it’s all over, it’ll be worth it

Well you’re entitled to feel that way. if you’re uncomfortable, I’m not gonna try to change that.

Although for me, I don’t really consider the angst to be “mean” because 1) they’re fictional characters so they’ll be okay, 2) the angst is for storytelling purposes, not to torture us or make us feel bad, and 3) we know they get a happy ending
